name: GetTrelloEnterpriseById
description:
Retrieve Trello enterprise details using enterprise ID.

Use this tool to obtain information about a specific Trello enterprise by providing its ID. Useful for accessing details about an enterprise's configuration, members, and more.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello enterprise to retrieve details for.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: enterprise_fields_to_retrieve
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of enterprise fields to include: `id`, `name`, `displayName`, etc.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of: `id`, `name`, `displayName`, `prefs`, `ssoActivationFailed`, `idAdmins`, `idMembers` (Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is 'normal' or 'admins'. Pagination can be controlled with member_startIndex, etc, but the API response will not contain the total available result count or pagination status data. Read the SCIM documentation [here]() for more information on filtering), `idOrganizations`, `products`, `userTypes`, `idMembers`, `idOrganizations`

parameters.name: member_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of members to retrieve: `none`, `normal`, `admins`, `owners`, or `all`.

value_schema.description: One of: `none`, `normal`, `admins`, `owners`, `all`

parameters.name: member_details_field
parameters.description: Specify one member detail to retrieve: `avatarHash`, `fullName`, `initials`, or `username`.

value_schema.description: One of: `avatarHash`, `fullName`, `initials`, `username`

parameters.name: member_filter_query
parameters.description: SCIM-style query to filter members, taking precedence over 'all', 'normal', or 'admins'. If used, pagination is applied to the member array.

value_schema.description: Pass a [SCIM-style query](/cloud/trello/scim/) to filter members. This takes precedence over the all/normal/admins value of members. If any of the member_* args are set, the member array will be paginated.

parameters.name: member_sorting_value
parameters.description: A SCIM-style sorting value for sorting members. Prefix with '-' for descending. Uses 'ascending' by default.

value_schema.description: This parameter expects a [SCIM-style](/cloud/trello/scim/) sorting value prefixed by a `-` to sort descending. If no `-` is prefixed, it will be sorted ascending. Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is 'normal' or 'admins'. Pagination can be controlled with member_startIndex, etc, but the API response will not contain the total available result count or pagination status data.

parameters.name: deprecated_member_sort_by
parameters.description: Deprecated SCIM-style sorting value for members; consider using member_sort instead.

value_schema.description: Deprecated: Please use member_sort. This parameter expects a [SCIM-style sorting value](/cloud/trello/scim/). Note that the members array returned will be paginated if `members` is `normal` or `admins`. Pagination can be controlled with `member_startIndex`, etc, and the API response's header will contain the total count and pagination state.

parameters.name: use_member_sort_order
parameters.description: This argument is deprecated. Consider using `member_sort` instead. Acceptable values are `ascending`, `descending`, `asc`, or `desc`.

value_schema.description: Deprecated: Please use member_sort. One of: `ascending`, `descending`, `asc`, `desc`

parameters.name: member_start_index
parameters.description: The starting index for pagination of the member array, ranging from 0 to 100.

value_schema.description: Any integer between 0 and 100.

parameters.name: member_limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of members in the result, ranging from 0 to 100.

parameters.name: organization_visibility
parameters.description: Specify the visibility of organizations associated with the enterprise. Options: none, members, public, all.

value_schema.description: One of: `none`, `members`, `public`, `all`

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Specify valid values that the nested organization field resource accepts to retrieve specific organization details.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization field resource]() accepts.

parameters.name: organization_memberships_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list indicating the desired organization memberships: `me`, `normal`, `admin`, `active`, `deactivated`.

value_schema.description: Comma-seperated list of: `me`, `normal`, `admin`, `active`, `deactivated`

parameters.name: include_paid_account_info
parameters.description: Set to true to include paid account information in the returned workspace objects, or false to exclude it.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace objects

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.
